thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: New York Fed Picks John Williams as President

author: Michael S. Derby
title: New York Fed Picks John Williams as President

organizations.name: federal reserve bank of new york

text:
The Federal Reserve Bank of New York said Tuesday that John Williams, who has helmed the San Francisco Fed since 2011, will become its next leader, assuming one of the top leadership positions at the U.S. central bank.
Mr. Williams, a 55-year-old economist whose research has helped shape top Federal Reserve officialsâ€™ thinking on monetary policy, is set to succeed William Dudley, who will retire June 17. Mr. Williams will start the next day.
...
